query.queryinfo: select [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject], [System.NodeName], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [System.ChangedDate] from WorkItems where [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' and ([System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\MCSF1') and [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' and [UI.Reserved] contains '[B69SP4H3R4M]' and [System.State] in ('New', 'Assigned') and [System.NodeName] in ('Heart', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Lung Nodule', 'Dual Energy Analysis', 'Dental Application', 'Colon Analysis', 'Body Perfusion', 'Bone Structure Analysis', 'Lung Density Analysis', 'Report', 'Review 4D', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'FFR', 'Brain Perfusion_CT_3D', 'App2', 'AppCommon', 'AppCom') and ([UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] = '' or [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] < @today or [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] > '2021-08-31T00:00:00.0000000') order by [System.State], [System.NodeName]

SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [System.NodeName], [System.CreatedDate], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [System.State] IN ('New', 'Assigned') AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' AND ( [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] NOT CONTAINS '[SWBU_69_SP4]' AND [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] NOT CONTAINS '[SWBU_69SP4_R2]' AND [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] NOT CONTAINS '[SWBU_69SP4_R1]' AND [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] NOT CONTAINS '[SWBU_71]' ) AND [System.CreatedDate] >= '2020-01-01T00:00:00.0000000' AND [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] CONTAINS '[HSW-uWS-CT]' AND ( [UI.bug.keyword] NOT CONTAINS '[0812Review]' AND [UI.bug.keyword] NOT CONTAINS '[1111Review]' AND [UI.bug.keyword] NOT CONTAINS '[1130Review]' AND [UI.bug.keyword] NOT CONTAINS '[1023Review]' AND [UI.Reserved] NOT CONTAINS '[0812Review]' AND [UI.Reserved] NOT CONTAINS '[1111Review]' AND [UI.Reserved] NOT CONTAINS '[1130Review]' ) AND ( [UI.bug.keyword] NOT CONTAINS 'wish' AND [UI.Reserved] NOT CONTAINS 'wish' ) AND [System.NodeName] IN ('Heart', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Lung Nodule', 'Dual Energy Analysis', 'Dental Application', 'Colon Analysis', 'Body Perfusion', 'Bone Structure Analysis', 'Lung Density Analysis', 'Report', 'Review 4D', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'FFR', 'Brain Perfusion_CT_3D', 'App2', 'AppCommon', 'AppCom') AND [UI.Reserved] NOT CONTAINS '[B69SP4H3R4M]' ORDER BY [System.NodeName]

SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject], [System.NodeName], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [System.ChangedDate] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' AND ( [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\MCSF1' ) AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' AND [UI.Reserved] CONTAINS '[B69SP4H3R4M]' AND [System.State] IN ('Resolved', 'Verified', 'Closed', 'Terminated') AND [System.NodeName] IN ('Heart', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Lung Nodule', 'Dual Energy Analysis', 'Dental Application', 'Colon Analysis', 'Body Perfusion', 'Bone Structure Analysis', 'Lung Density Analysis', 'Report', 'Review 4D', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'FFR', 'Brain Perfusion_CT_3D', 'App2', 'AppCommon', 'AppCom') AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate] >= @today ORDER BY [System.State], [System.NodeName]
